summary: Re-skin of heavier set of the Dragonscale armor
descriptionHtml:
Second re-skin completed now, unfortunately only male is available at the moment. My to-do list is to go back and make a female version for my Blue version of the lighter dragonscale set and if people like this one as well I will make a female version for this set as well. Feel free to leave any kind of comments, I love any kind of suggestions or requests.

Other Dragonscale re-skin I have done.
=======
Blue-Scales White Dragon
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1725
=======
author: Dgrayed
